titleStmt.title: A true relation of what hath been transacted in behalf of those of the reformed religion, during the treaty of peace at Reswick With an account of the present persecution in France.
titleStmt.author: Gaujac, Peter Gally de.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Lowndes over-against Exeter-Exchange in the Strand, and to be sold by E. Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatory" signed: P. G. D.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
